msg: Introduce a variant of svn_stream_from_aprfile2, that takes cached file handles

author: aconway
msg: Fix ClusterFailover.cpp and ForkedBroker.cpp to avoid using the default data directory.
Was causing tests to fail because of a pre-existing lock file in the default data dir.
